comment_body:
Too short and really needs to be more developed and descriptive, without describing the story better this would hardly impress 1st Graders.
Don‚Äôt take my comment as hate but try improving üòÅ

One of the hardest tricks about writing isn't necessarily knowing what to say, but what *not* to say.

I like your story.  Keep posing . . .
Thanks for the advice. It's my 1st or something try and it was hard for me. I'll try to improve!
Thank you so much. It was hard for me, and I'm very grateful for your encouragement!
Yeah, definitely don't give up. I look forward to seeing what you write next :).
